name: Nyctli
description: A tiny fey creature known for its chaotic evil nature, exhibiting a mischievous and malevolent demeanor. It excels in stealth and surprises foes with its abilities.
memorable: Its ability to blind opponents and manipulate light provides a tactical advantage, making it a formidable ambusher despite its fragility.
goals: To cause chaos and mischief, often attacking unsuspecting foes.
relations: Frequently encountered with other fey creatures; could serve more powerful chaotic beings.
environment: Typically found in dark, wooded areas or places of magic.
strengths: High Dexterity and exceptional stealth make it hard to hit, while its ability to inflict status effects can severely hinder opponents.
weaknesses: Weak physical stats make it vulnerable in direct melee combat.
attacks: Uses stingers for melee attacks, dealing piercing and necrotic damage, potentially blinding foes.
most_powerful_ability: The Stingers attack can inflict blindness, significantly hindering an opponent's combat effectiveness.
senses: Possesses darkvision with a range of 60 feet and a passive perception score of 14, enhancing its ability to notice details.
skills: Notably skilled in Perception and Stealth, making it adept at sneaking and hiding.
additional_information: Can magically extinguish light sources within 30 feet.
Low hit points make it frail in direct confrontations.
Chaotic nature allows for unpredictable behavior.
Significant maneuverability due to flying speed.
Ability to create darkness for tactical advantages.
